General.Name: ECIT AS
General.Description: ECIT AS provides IT, finance and accounting, and technology solutions in Norway and internationally. The company offers finance and accounting services, including accounting, payroll, and HR, as well as process management, reporting/controlling, annual reports/tax, advisory, and debt collection; IT services and support, such as managed services, hosting and hybrid cloud, IT consulting, and digitalization. It also provides software solutions for payroll, office support, and accounting lines, as well as automation and robotics / ML / AI solutions. ECIT AS was founded in 2013 and is based in Fornebu, Norway.
